reviews.subject: Introduction to Psychology
reviews.review: Engaging lectures and fair grading. Highly recommended!

reviews.subject: Organic Chemistry
reviews.review: Challenging course, but Prof. Chen explains concepts well.

reviews.subject: World History
reviews.review: Fascinating content and great discussions in class.

reviews.subject: Calculus II
reviews.review: Tough material, but Prof. Lee is always available for office hours.

reviews.subject: Introduction to Literature
reviews.review: Dr. Foster's passion for literature is contagious. Loved this class!

reviews.subject: Microeconomics
reviews.review: Clear explanations of complex concepts. Tests are challenging.

reviews.subject: Artificial Intelligence
reviews.review: Cutting-edge material and great projects. Dr. Wang is brilliant.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Interesting field trips, but lectures can be a bit dry.

reviews.subject: Abnormal Psychology
reviews.review: Fascinating case studies and thoughtful discussions.

reviews.subject: Constitutional Law
reviews.review: Challenging but rewarding. Prof. Wilson really knows his stuff.

reviews.subject: Spanish Literature
reviews.review: Dr. Garcia's enthusiasm makes even difficult texts enjoyable.

reviews.subject: Introduction to Philosophy
reviews.review: Thought-provoking content, but grading can be inconsistent.

reviews.subject: Molecular Biology
reviews.review: Extremely challenging, but Dr. Green is an excellent teacher.

reviews.subject: Linear Algebra
reviews.review: Clear explanations, but homework can be very time-consuming.

reviews.subject: Social Psychology
reviews.review: Engaging lectures and interesting group projects. Highly recommended!

reviews.subject: Financial Accounting
reviews.review: Prof. Anderson has great real-world examples. Exams are tough but fair.

reviews.subject: Quantum Physics
reviews.review: Incredibly challenging material, but Dr. Lee explains it well.

reviews.subject: Creative Writing
reviews.review: Prof. Baker's feedback is invaluable. Really improved my writing.

reviews.subject: Human Anatomy
reviews.review: Detailed lectures and helpful lab sessions. Be prepared to study hard.

reviews.subject: International Relations
reviews.review: Insightful discussions and well-structured course. Enjoyed every class.
